Pre-Game Insights: The Men in Blue have dominated the home World Cup with three wins out of three games.
Bangladesh suffered its second consecutive defeat in the tournament after losing to New Zealand by seven wickets in Chennai.
India has a better chance to win this fixture and defeat Bangladesh to register its fourth straight win in the ICC ODI World Cup 2023.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The MCA Stadium in Pune has produced great batting tracks with an average score of 305.
Bowlers can come as the pitch allows fast bowlers to extract some movement with the new ball, especially in the second innings.
Shakib Al Hasan could miss the game in Pune due to a fitness issue as he was diagnosed with a quad tear.
Others: Rohit Sharma-led Team India has dominated every opponent so far in the tournament.
The batting has been in exquisite form, especially in the top order.
The bowling department has seemingly over-performed and firmly made the Men in Blue one of the top favourites for the title.
